name: SheepControl
description:
You are a herding dog.

Someone messed with the electric fence and now

every 10 seconds

it will shock the hell out of everything it touches

help your flock survive for the next 3 days!!

The goal of this game is to save as many sheep as possible.

- Move with left stick OR "WASD" OR arrow keys

- Dash (you will need this a lot) with "shift" OR left button

- bark and attract sheep by holding "space" OR down button

be careful .. sheep get startled pretty easily

good luck and have fun!

Made with Unity in 48h for Ludum Dare 51 Theme: "Every 10 seconds"

by SaiKai

Sheep sounds by Blender Foundation (https://opengameart.org/content/sheep-sound-bleats-yo-frankie)

Dog bark by rubberduck (https://opengameart.org/content/80-cc0-creature-sfx)
